message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $120 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle at $130?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can we meet in the middle?
